projects.title: Etchingham Road
projects.headline: Family house extension, kitchen in the old space, maximum storage up to the ceiling, large island.

projects.title: Avenue Road
projects.headline: Kosher kitchen in a St John’s Wood flat for a couple downsizing; with a large family visiting on a weekly basis.
projects.description: Comprex model: FORMA, Silk Lacquer, light grey, with matt white quartz worktops, Miele appliances. Quooker boiling water tap and Fisher & Paykel free standing refrigerator.
projects.feedback: It was very pleasant to work with the team, they were very helpful. Kati provided a good solution for the coffee machine, for the juicer not to interfere with cooking as well as our need for double storage. Eventually, we have a lot of storage for everything. Utility room works well, we regret though that the Miele laundry doors are not more flexible. We could do with a larger breakfast bar but have limited space. The kitchen installation was on time, well fitted and without difficulty.

projects.title: Corfu
projects.headline: Holiday house in Greece, small, stylish, open plan downstairs space.
projects.description: Arredo3 model: FRIDA, matt pore lacquer and factory glass units, with a white quartz worktop wrapping.
projects.feedback: Kati made the whole process for us very simple and straight forward. We were offered lots of designs that suited our taste and Kati was mindful of our requirements and paid attention to our requests. Our project was somewhat difficult as it was located in Greece. Kati, however, organized the kitchen supply (and worktops!) and everything went very smoothly. Our builder had no problems and worked well with Kati (even with the language differences). We would not hesitate to recommend Kati and Wise Turtle.

projects.title: Creighton Avenue
projects.headline: Large house extension in East Finchley, open plan kitchen in a designated area for a family of four.
projects.description: Arredo3 model: WEGA high glass lacquered and wood laminate furniture, white quartz worktops, Siemens appliances, Boling water tap from ITHO. Bronze glass wall cladding.
projects.feedback: I was introduced to Kati from Wise Turtle to design my kitchen. She has provided an excellent service making sure we had as many meetings as we needed to get the design I wanted just to my requirements. Delivery and fitting was right on schedule. I had a few minor issues with some of the parts delivered but this happens in so many cases. However her aftercare service and promises to get things done until we were 100% satisfied are faultless thanks to her assistant who makes sure she is on top of any issues that need resolving. Thank you Kati!

projects.title: Elstree Road
projects.headline: Family house with a ground floor extension and semi open plan kitchen next to the living area.
projects.description: Arredo3 model: KALI Fenix Londra and light wood laminate accent colour. White quartz worktops, Siemens appliances, Elica extractor.
projects.feedback: I would highly recommend Wise Turtle Interiors, Kati made the whole process such a real pleasure. Her professional design input and constant attention to detail was so appreciated and reflected in the end-result. Professionally project managed from start to finish, we could not be happier! Great design, great product and a great team. Thank you!

projects.title: Ferncroft Gardens
projects.headline: Restructured and modernized kitchen extension for family of three in Hampstead.
projects.description: Comprex model: FORMA White Silk Lacquer and Lito veneered, grey oak combination, Siemens appliances. Quooker Boling water tap and Corian Worktops.
projects.comment: Family kitchen to cook, work, entertain and relax. The tall units, integrated into the wall, improve the room's proportions. The cooking area is well defined. The large island serves all other functions. For full comfort and visual pleasure the Corian worktop is 20mm in the cooking area, 40 on the island and 12mm at TV / display units.

projects.title: Hampstead High Street
projects.headline: House extension for growing family in Hampstead with the challenge on low ceiling and structural constraints.
projects.description: Compex Forma model: FORMA White Silk Lacquer, Gaggenau and Siemens appliances, Corian worktop. Island with breakfast bar.
projects.feedback: Kati’s initial consultation enabled us to think about what we wanted in a kitchen from appliances, materials to budget. Her experience and knowledge of kitchen design is second to none and she always came up with the perfect solution – she was always happy to help and accommodate our needs at any time. She provided us with the perfect amount of clever storage and appliances to accommodate a busy lifestyle and family as well as being aesthetically pleasing. Creating our kitchen was a seamless, stress-free process and being keen cooks we very much enjoy using it.

projects.title: Islington Place
projects.headline: Contemporary family house with high ceiling and internal yard, kitchen is for a gourmand chef with family and friends to entertain.
projects.description: Comprex model: FORMA and FILO furniture, Fenix doors in two different grey colours. Neolith Beton worktop, Gaggenau and Siemens appliances, Quooker Twin taps with boiling water, two Falmec air purifiers above the island. Modern property with high ceilings.
projects.comment: This was an exciting challenge; designing a 3 metres high and over 5 metres long wall of kitchen for a professional cook, new mum and great entertainer. The property has an uncommon shape; this living, cooking and dining area incorporates an internal garden. We achieved a great look with large preparation areas, lots of storage combing low level large drawers and high level carboards. Two ovens with steam and microwave functions, air purifiers and a boiling water tap compliment the great advantage of cooking on a full flex Gaggenau induction hob. The clients enjoy their new space tremendously.

projects.title: Liverpool Road
projects.headline: Open plan kitchen for a townhouse in Islington for busy parents with a child and a nanny.
projects.description: Comprex model: LINEA (12mm doors) Silk matte lacquer, Gaggenau and Siemens appliances, Falmec Air Purifier, Carrara Veneto worktop.
projects.comment: An open plan, minimalist kitchen in a newly built, contemporary house. We reorganised the available space, introduced tall units, replaced developers' poor storage solutions with large drawers and added internal drawers in the tall unit. High quality appliances and well proportioned work surface serve the family much better.

projects.title: Reece Mews
projects.headline: Newly built mews house development in Kensington. The kitchen is on the lower ground floor.
projects.description: Comprex forma with two door-finishes. Silk matte lacquer and top qualty wood veneer. Siemens appliances, the island wrapped around with quartz worktop.
projects.feedback: Kati has done a beautiful job of our new kitchen. It is now my favourite place in our home. It has a great finish and makes use of all the available space. Kati’s input into the design process was personal and thoughtful. Throughout the project she was available and attentive. Although we experienced a few glitches along the way, she stuck with it to the end, insisting on a perfect finish. That is why I would recommend her without hesitation to anyone.

projects.title: St Stephanes Close
projects.headline: Redesigning their kitchen was part of a full refurbishment for a Jewish couple with two younger generations visiting on Friday nights.
projects.description: Comprex model: FORMA Ultra matte and natural touch laminates. Quartz worktop, Miele and Gaggenau appliances. Boiling water tap: Quooker.
projects.feedback: Kati designed the kitchen in my last home. Her imagination brought out some wonderful ideas that had not been considered before by ourselves or other designers. She listened very carefully to our requirements, putting these together confidently with her considerable experience and her seriously good design skills. The result was stunning and became a stylish practical room, not just somewhere to cook. It became our favourite room and was the envy of our neighbours. I have absolutely no hesitation in recommending Kati’s work.

projects.title: West End Lane
projects.headline: Minimalist approach at the centre of a refurbished mansion block apartment.
projects.description: Schroeder model: COLOR matte lacquered doors, Corian worktop and wrap island, Siemens appliances. Ceiling extractor from Westin.
projects.feedback: Wise Turtle Interiors were hired to advise on designing and supplying our kitchen and appliances. I would highly recommend them if you’re looking for a clean, simple design and good quality product. I also found it useful for coordinating the delivery and fitting. We chose high end appliances which we loved as well. Wise Turtle were generally professional and flexible.

projects.title: Wood Vale
projects.headline: Challenging 7 metres long kitchen due to a house extension with 1.8 metres horizontal wall units.
projects.description: Comprex model: FORMA CLASSIC matte lacquered base and tall units with gloss lacquered wall units. Quartz worktops and Siemens appliances.
projects.feedback: Before contacting Kati I had talked to a number of different kitchen companies, but no-one had managed to come up with a design which was both beautiful and practical. Kati’s design is stunning and her ideas work well in the space available – the kitchen still looks great two years later, so the quality is there too, which is really important. I really enjoy working – and eating! – in the space Kati created.
